last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 7
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Benjamin tortures Matthew to near death, Diana makes plans to rescue him. Revelations from the Book of Life illuminate the long-hidden secrets of creatures.

name: A Discovery of Witches
overview: Closet witch Diana Bishop and centuries-old vampire Matthew Clairmont are drawn into a deadly mystery and forbidden romance when a magical book shows up in an Oxford library.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Matthew and Diana travel back to Elizabethan London, where they are hiding in time from the Congregation. Here, they must find a powerful witch teacher to help Diana control her magic and search for the elusive Book of Life. Back in the present day, Diana’s beloved aunts must take shelter with notorious witch hunter Ysabeau De Clermont at her ancestral home.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season 3, the final season, Matthew and Diana return from their trip to 1590 to find tragedy at Sept-Tours. They must find the missing pages from the Book of Life and the Book itself before it’s too late. Their enemies are gearing up against them, and a monster from Matthew’s past who has been lying in wait will return for revenge.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Things get creepy for historian and closet witch Diana Bishop when she calls up a magical manuscript. Her discovery is about to throw her back into the world of magic and into the path of Matthew Clairmont, a centuries old vampire.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As Matthew fights to control his cravings, he leaves Diana to face her enemies alone. And those include powerful witch Peter Knox.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Diana and Matthew's relationship moves forward. But something's about to happen that will cast them both further into danger.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Diana gets a chilly welcome when she seeks safety at the Clairmont family home. Back in Oxford, trouble is brewing.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Matthew crosses a dangerous line when he returns to Oxford. Diana discovers his dark past, before something unexpected tears them apart.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Matthew and Baldwin race to save Diana from Satu's dangerous dark magic. In Oxford, Sophie shocks Agatha with a confession.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Diana's aunts' home gives up all sorts of secrets when Diana and Matthew pay a visit. Danger looms as Juliette breaks free from Gerbert.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: With danger at every turn, Diana and Matthew are forced to run. But will they escape in time? Series finale.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Reluctant witch Diana Bishop and vampire Matthew Clairmont seek refuge in the fascinating and treacherous world of Elizabethan London. There, they must find a powerful witch to help Diana control her magic and search for the elusive Book of Life.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As she continues her search for a mentor, Diana meets wealthy alchemist Mary Sidney. London's vampire ruler demands fealty from Diana and Matthew as he is unnerved by their sudden arrival in the City.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In the present, Domenico makes a disturbing discovery in Oxford. Back in 1590, Matthew must beg for forgiveness from Father Hubbard.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Another vicious vampire murder rocks present-day Oxford. Marcus makes a breakthrough.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Matthew and Diana arrive in France on their journey to face Philippe. Elsewhere, Louisa and Kit cut a swathe through London.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Philippe makes a troubling discovery, provoking a conflict with Matthew. Ysabeau, Em and Sarah start to look for a message.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Matthew and Diana go to Bohemia to search for Edward Kelley and the Book of Life. There, they encounter the strange Emperor Rudolf II.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: In 1590, Diana is transfixed as she tries to work out what the Book is telling her. Matthew worries over the Book's power.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: As Diana and Matthew return to London, Diana learns news that could change everything. The Queen holds Matthew to account.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The second series reaches a dramatic conclusion. Realising that she must return to the present, Diana aims to complete her training.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Matthew and Diana travel back to Elizabethan London, where they are hiding in time from the Congregation. Here, they must find a powerful witch teacher to help Diana control her magic and search for the elusive Book of Life. Back in the present day, Diana’s beloved aunts must take shelter with notorious witch hunter Ysabeau De Clermont at her ancestral home.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Matthew and Diana return to a Sept-Tours in chaos, but amid the darkness they get some wonderful news.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Diana is forced to make a confession after being shocked by the appearance of a familiar face - Jack Blackfriars.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In New Orleans, Matthew and Marcus attempt to reconnect with Marcus' unforgiving children. Jack struggles to control his blood rage.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Matthew is relieved at his reconciliation with the New Orleans vampires. Diana, Phoebe and Sarah struggle to find TJ Weston.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Benjamin's plan to bring down the de Clermonts is set into motion, while Matthew and Diana return to Sept-Tours for a christening.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After receiving Benjamin's message, Matthew leaves Sept-Tours to track him down. Diana asks for help to get the Book of Life.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: As Benjamin tortures Matthew to near death, Diana makes plans to rescue him. Revelations from the Book of Life illuminate the long-hidden secrets of creatures.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season 3, the final season, Matthew and Diana return from their trip to 1590 to find tragedy at Sept-Tours. They must find the missing pages from the Book of Life and the Book itself before it’s too late. Their enemies are gearing up against them, and a monster from Matthew’s past who has been lying in wait will return for revenge.
